summary: Raphael is an archangel who first appeared in ancient Jewish texts. He is known for healing and is often linked to the angel who helped at the Pool of Bethesda in the Bible. In Islam, he is called Israfil and will blow a trumpet to signal the Day of Judgment. Raphael is also important in Gnostic traditions. Despite his significance, Raphael is not named in the New Testament or the Quran.
title: Raphael (archangel)
